label: 藤原有信
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1040-1099). Son of Sanetsuna. Cousin of Atsumune. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (7), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (6). Compositions in Honchō zoku monzui 本朝続文粋. [実綱、敦宗、漢詩]
